title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When trying to add a localization key, if the key field is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The properties file contains a blank key with a valid value. The expected result is that the valid value can be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
EB: Currently, when a blank key is added, the externalized value is not displayed.
SR: The system should allow valid values to be externalized and displayed in the chart title even when the key field is left blank.
